description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the code integrity guard security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-43585), it is essential to apply the relevant updates based on your Windows version:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (x64 or 32-bit).
2. Download and apply the suitable update package:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: Install update [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284).
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: Install update [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285).
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Install update [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280).
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: Install update [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273).

**Details**:
- These updates address a security feature bypass that allows unauthorized access to protected resources.
- Ensure your system meets the prerequisites for each KB before installation. Backup data before proceeding. 

**Build Numbers**:
- Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.2033
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4317
- Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.5011

This will help mitigate the risk associated with this vulnerability. (LLM Synthesized)
